summary: After being left by her husband and fired from her work, a workaholic businesswoman is forced to go through a big change in her life and becomes a partner on a decadent sex shop.
cast: Ingrid Guimarães|Maria Paula|Bruno Garcia|Denise Weinberg|Antonio Pedro|Cristina Pereira|Charles Paraventi|João Fernandes|Flávia Alessandra|Marcos Pasquim|Flávio Pardal|Rodrigo Candelot|Zé Peregrino|Juliana Guimarães|David Herman|Raul Labancca|Sérgio Stern|Heitor Vignoli|Antônio Destro|Marcelo Saback|Marcela Altberg|Henrique Taxman|Sérgio Rufino|Renan Mattos|Núbia Pinheiro|Deise Mendes|Irene de Oliveira Alves|Edi Alexandre|Maria Rosa Moreira|Carol Catache|Malu Bierrenbach|Flávia Couto|Antonio Joaquim Andrade|Eda Nagayama|Caren Utino|Thereza Ronconi|Hani Hallage|Rodrigo Oliveira|Paula Sandroni|Larissa Bracher|Sandro Borges|Emerson Beraldo|Marcelo Flores|Ricardo Ferreira|Stela Celano|Cláudio Torres Gonzaga|Alexandre Ackerman|João Gomes|Vyvian Albouquerque|Lula Gonçalves|Paulo Aguiar|Ada Chaseliov|Ricardo Pavão|Juraci de Souza|Claudia Menezes|Ítala Roberta|Dani Cavanellas|Clarice Silva|Cátia Cabral|Dilene Prado|Marina Magalhães|Indrig Medeiros|Michel Bercovitch|Carlos Vieira|Ana Matilde Pinheiro
title: De Pernas pro Ar
